metadata.title: CVE-2024-46727 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Add otg_master NULL check withinresource_log_pipe_topology_update[Why]Coverity reports NULL_RETURN warning.[How]Add otg_master NULL check.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
